title: Handle a Counterfeit Ticket
description: A fan presents a ticket at the gate that is identified as counterfeit by the scanning system.

tasks.description: The gate scanner flags the ticket as invalid. The gate attendant notifies security.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system prevents entry, and security is alerted.

tasks.description: Security escorts the fan to the customer service window.
tasks.expected_outcome: The fan is moved to a secure location to resolve the issue.

tasks.description: A customer service agent investigates the ticket and confirms it is counterfeit, explaining the situation to the fan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the ticket is fake and explains why.

tasks.description: Log the incident and advise the fan to only purchase tickets from official team channels.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the counterfeit ticket incident and provides advice to the fan.
